These docs help you use the services provided by the Earthdata Search Platform and NASA’s CMR STAC. Its purpose is to be a resource for interacting with NASA data and provide use cases as well as behaviors in ArcGIS Pro and open-source data.






Purpose of the Documentation Hub
How to Use This Resource

To learn from examples, see the Tutorial Page for  examples of data services and images.
